text: Volodymyr Krynskyi (; born 14 January 1997 in Ukraine) is a professional Ukrainian football goalkeeper who plays for Inhulets Petrove. Krynskyi is a product of UFK-Olimpik Kharkiv youth sportive system. In 2014, he signed contract with FC Poltava in the Ukrainian First League and made his debjut in match against FC Kolos Kovalivka on 8 October 2016. On 2 July 2018, he signed 3-year contract with Ukrainian Premier League club Olimpik Donetsk after the dissolution of FC Poltava. ==References == == External links == * Profile on FFU site * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:People from Chuhuiv Raion Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:FC Poltava players Category:FC Olimpik Donetsk players Category:FC Inhulets Petrove players
title: Volodymyr Krynskyi
